doc.title: Cadillacs and Dinosaurs
doc.plot: 'The past and future have collided in a world gone mad...' This is a comic-book style beat-em-up, set in a derelict New York City in the year 2513. Jack Tenrec, Mess O'Bradovich, the lovely Diplomat and Explorer Hannah Dundee and Mustapha Cairo are our main characters. They all drive around in their Cadillacs battling against the Black Marketeers, odd dinosaurs and a crazed scientist bent of taking over the world.
